Summary: 100 yds up about 30'across looked like a solar eclipse dark 90% across with luminecence around i felt naturally confused
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Vernal
There were no other sightings in Vernal on or around July 24th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in the hammock i seen a small bright light that was simalar to what i presume to be the space station i got up to look because the tree was in the way and looked straight up a little south and seen a black spot with a small light source around it bout 30 feet across and maybe 100 yards up and felt confused then looked again nothing was there includind the small bright light there were stars further south from the where the small light shown through the tree but only about 25% as bright and the light from the small spot the space station is further south but for some reason i didnt notice its light until a week later on a side note july 24 is pioneer day in utah the states birthday and this dark spot was directly west of a mormon temple
